Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet
Description: Small amulet with two differently treated surfaces: the first one is flat while the other depicts, in low relief, the frontal view of a deity with its arms at its sides. On the head there is a headdress composed of three cobras with a suspension hole pierced across the base thereof.
